name: How to Renew CSPO Certification
description: When you take Certified Scrum Product Owner® (CSPO®) training with us, throughout the two day workshop, you will learn – and practice – all that is required for Scrum Alliance certification from instructor Mark Levison, one of the oldest Scrum/Agile practitioners in Canada (he's been practicing since 2001, before Scrum was popular). Included in the ...
